The '''BP Bounty''' is an item exclusive to players who have purchased the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus packages for [[Battle Pass]].

Upon reaching Lv. 30, players are given the option to pick one of the following 4{{star}} weapons:

|-
| Catalyst || {{Card List|Solar Pearl;Sacrificial Jade|delim=;|show_caption=1}}
|-
| Bow || {{Card List|The Viridescent Hunt;Scion of the Blazing Sun|delim=;|show_caption=1}}
|-
| Polearm || {{Card List|Deathmatch;Ballad of the Fjords|delim=;|show_caption=1}}
|}
